sitename: Jacksonville Acupuncture and Holistic Health Center - Holistic health services by Dr. Michael Kowalski
cleaned_text: Natural Supplements Store Welcome to our Natural Supplements Store at the Acupuncture and Holistic Health Center, located in Jacksonville, FL. We strive to make your shopping here an excellent experience. If you are a returning patient, welcome back! If you are our patient and this is your first time ordering from us online, welcome! If you are not a patient of ours, we look forward to your business. We offer a variety of natural nutritional supplements - herbal and homeopathic remedies that have proven to be effective for a variety of health concerns. To order certain products marked patient only, it is required that you be a patient of this Center. If you are not yet our patient, you may follow the simple steps on our site to register as a patient, and we can follow up with you as appropriate. If you take any of these products as a part of your health regimen, we recommend you do so under the supervision of a licensed health care practitioner for your safety and best results. Enjoy FREE SHIPPING on all purchases over $200! *Automatically applied at checkout If you have questions, you may email us at [thecenter@treatrootcause.com](mailto:thecenter@treatrootcause.com). If you would like to share your experience with one or more of our products, please send us your testimonials, or just email us with your comments. Below please find our products. They are grouped by product type (Aches and Pains, Adrenal Support, etc) then listed by individual product. Please explore and don't hesitate to email us at [thecenter@treatrootcause.com](mailto:thecenter@treatrootcause.com) should you have any questions. We appreciate your business! Enjoy shopping! Yours in health, The staff at the Acupuncture and Holistic Health Center Jacksonville, FL Showing 1-16 of 59 results - Aches and Pains (6) - Adrenal Support (4) - Allergy and Sinus (6) - Antioxidants (1) - Blood Sugar Metabolism (1) - Bone (6) - Cardiovascular (9) - Covid-19 Resistance (7) - Detoxification (2) - Digestive Formulas (5) - Energy (5) - General (9) - Gut Health (2) - Homeopathics (2) - Hormone Balancing (2) - Immune Support (14) - Joint and Muscle Support (7) - Liver Support (2) - Men's Health (3) - Mental Health (6) - Patients Only (11) - Restorative Formulations (11) - Sleep Support (4) - Specialty Products (12) - Thyroid Balancing (4) - Vitamins (1) - Weight Management (2) - Women's Health (5) - Nature's Way Echinacea Complex$25.00 to -
